definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters

sentences.english: I don't like electricity，but I'm interested in the law of universal gravitation.
sentences.chinese: 我討厭電學，但我對萬有引力定律感興趣。

sentences.english: They are there, just like the law of gravity is there.
sentences.chinese: 它們是現實存在，就像萬有引力定律。

sentences.english: Gravitation is an force effect originating from instantaneous power of fed back energy ;
sentences.chinese: 萬有引力是反饋能量之瞬時功率的力物理效應。

sentences.english: This law of gravity is such a pain.
So I have got these equations which explain how gravity works.
sentences.chinese: 這樣我才能得出解釋萬有引力是如何運作的方程式。

sentences.english: So instead we accept the law of gravity.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們接受萬有引力定律。

sentences.english: Everybody knows that. It's the property of gravitation.
sentences.chinese: 這就是萬有引力的性質，我們都很瞭解了。

sentences.english: The resulting freshwater can then be distributed to the fields using gravitational flow.
sentences.chinese: 這最終的淡水可以利用萬有引力流動分步到農場。

sentences.english: Will you truly refuse to accept the law of gravity?
sentences.chinese: 你真得能拒絕接受萬有引力定律嗎？

sentences.english: And what did he know at all of moving bodies and gravity?
sentences.chinese: 他哪知道什麼運動物體和萬有引力呢？

sentences.english: Few on Earth would argue with the fundamental law of gravity.
sentences.chinese: 地球上幾乎沒有人懷疑萬有引力基本定律。

sentences.english: Their gravitational pull is so strong, they absorb light.
sentences.chinese: 黑洞的萬有引力很強，能把光線吸進去。

sentences.english: Physicists have struggled to marry quantum mechanics with gravity for decades.
sentences.chinese: 物理學家努力了幾十年將萬有引力結合到量子力學。

sentences.english: So a lot of people objected to Newton's postulation of this gravitational force.
sentences.chinese: 所以很多人拒絕接受牛頓關於萬有引力的假設。

sentences.english: Things would be so much easier without the law of gravity.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有萬有引力，事情就易辦多了。

sentences.english: Valuation is the closest thing to the law of gravity that we have in finance.
sentences.chinese: 估值是在我們的理財中最接近萬有引力定律的東西。

definition: stepping stone/fig. person used to advance one's career
